Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Nena, “Choonadi chadza ndipo bodza latha ndipo silidzabwereranso.”
Nena, “Ngati ine ndilakwa, ndilakwira mzimu wanga ndipo ngati ndatsatira njira yolungama ndi chifukwa cha zimene Ambuye wanga amavumbulutsa kwa ine. Ndithudi Iye amamva ndipo ali pafupi.”
Ndipo iwe ukadangoona nthawi imene adzachite mantha komabe iwo sadzathawa ndipo iwo adzagwidwa asanapitepatali
Ndipoiwoadzati,“Ifetilikukhulupirira.” Kodi kukhulupirira kwawo kudzawathandiza bwanji kuchokera kutali
Ndipo iwo sadakhulupirire kale ndipo amanena kuti ndi nkhani za m’maluwa kuchokera kutali
Ndipo chipupa chidzakhazikitsidwa pakati pawo ndi zofuna zawo monga momwe adachitira ndi anthu ena a kale. Ndithudi iwo ndi okayika kwambiri

Kuyamikidwa konse ndi kwa Mulungu, Namalenga wakumwamba ndi dziko lapansi, amene adalenga angelo, atumwi ouluka, amapiko awiri, atatu ndi anayi. Iye amachulukitsa zolengedwa mwachifuniro chake. Ndithudi Mulungu ali ndi mphamvu pa chinthu china chilichonse
Chimene Mulungu, mwachifundo chake, amapereka kwa anthu palibe amene angawalande, ndipo chilichonse chimene Iye awamana palibe wina amene angawapatse. Iye ndiye Mwini mphamvu ndiponso Mwini nzeru

Oh anthu inu! Kumbukirani zokoma zimene Mulungu adakupatsani! Kodipali Namalengawinakupatula Mulungu amene akhoza kukupatsani zokoma kuchokera kumwamba kapena padziko lapansi? Kulibe mulungu wina koma Iye yekha. Nanga ndi chifukwa chiyani mumanyengedwa
